protocol.name: P-G4455-1
protocol.text: Arabidopsis plants (Col-0) were grown at 22C under 16 h/8 h light and dark cycles for 10 days. Plants were grown on mineral nutrient media (Hirai et al. 1995 Plant Cell Physiology 36: 1331) containing 1% sucrose, 0.8% agar. For preparation of agar medium, agar was washed twice with 1 L of de-ionized water and vacuum filtrated. The agar medium with complete replacement of MgSO4 to MgCl2 contained approximately 10 ¼M of residual sulfate derived from agar. The S1500 agar media were prepared by adding 1500 ¼M of MgSO4.

protocol.name: P-G4455-2
protocol.text: Root samples were transferred to liquid nitrogen before RNA extraction.

protocol.name: P-G4455-3
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 10 microg total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-G4455-4
protocol.text: Total RNA was prepared using RNeasy Plant Mini Kit (Qiagen, Hilden, Germany) according to the manufacturer's instructions.

protocol.name: P-G4455-5
protocol.text: Arabidopsis plants (Col-0) were grown at 22C under 16 h/8 h light and dark cycles for 10 days. Plants were grown on mineral nutrient media (Hirai et al. 1995 Plant Cell Physiology 36: 1331) containing 1% sucrose, 0.8% agar. For preparation of agar medium, agar was washed twice with 1 L of de-ionized water and vacuum filtrated. The agar medium with complete replacement of MgSO4 to MgCl2 contained approximately 10 ¼M of residual sulfate derived from agar. The S15 agar media were prepared by adding 15 ¼M of MgSO4 and 1485 ¼M of MgCl2.
